Text: Yet again another great release. Thx for the !wes... If ur interested check out my jackin house mix here http://soundcloud.com/mr-matt/funk-fo-fridays

@littleplumber

Nice one, love it! What are the tracks at 16:20 and 45:30 ? Sound really cool. Would love to add them to my collection :P

@frogski

Thanx man. 16min one is greenskeepers - disco swing (original mix) and 45 is the sound diggers - bud love (original mix)

@frogski

He maybe on your next one you could grab a bunch of Corduroy Mavericks stuff. They have some amazing traxx. ;P

@littleplumber

Thanks! Yeah, I've already added Corduroy Mavericks, though it's mostly remixes done on other tracks. I'll dig a little more. See if I can find some more
YOu are the best! Great collections! I enjoy it verry much!
yet another outstanding collection of the very best of house some very cool tunes that i have not heard for a long time thank you, thank you, thank you
damn!!!! where do you get these songs, they are all so good....goddamn!!!!!!!
Seriously! frogski you are AWESOME! Its like these collections are a gift from the House Gods. Thank you so much...and keep uploading.

@frogski

Hey how come the files are .rar? Is it one continuous track?

@gtech211

No, they're individual tracks. In rar to prevent cherry picking :P
Thanks for the upload mate, You no doubt paid a lot for these tracks as i do, And shared the wealth!

@nazali

yeah, it's true. I usually spend 40-50 Euro's a month buying tracks. I don't really mind that. What I don't have much is time, which requires a lot to go through all stuff and pick out the better tracks :)
